verses.name: Proverbs 23:13
verses.text: Withhold not correction from the child: for if thou beatest him with the rod, he shall not die.

verses.name: Proverbs 23:14
verses.text: Thou shalt beat him with the rod, and shalt deliver his soul from hell.

verses.name: Proverbs 23:15
verses.text: My son, if thine heart be wise, my heart shall rejoice, even mine.

verses.name: Proverbs 23:16
verses.text: Yea, my reins shall rejoice, when thy lips speak right things.

verses.name: Proverbs 23:17
verses.text: Let not thine heart envy sinners: but be thou in the fear of the Lord all the day long.

verses.name: Proverbs 23:18
verses.text: For surely there is an end; and thine expectation shall not be cut off.
